Struct hash<float>

boost::hash<float>

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/functional/hash.hpp>


struct hash<float> {
  std::size_t operator()(float) const;
};

Description

std::size_t operator()(float val) const;

Returns:

Unspecified in TR1, except that equal arguments yield the same result.

hash_value(val) in Boost.

Throws:

Doesn't throw
